title: giridhara gOpAlanE
sahitya:
giridhara gOpAlanE bAlanE en piriyamAna oruvan jaya


anupallavi

  ariya uravum poruLum sukhamum avanE en iraivan jaya


caraNam 1    annai tandai suTram ennum abhimAnattai viDuttEn
ennai muTrum kaNNanukkE Eka bhOgamAgak-koDuttEn
    caraNam 2    Arvak-kaNNIr Utri Utri anbup-payirai vaLarttEn
mIrA kAntan mIden Atma viruppamellAm vaittEn jaya
